title: How to Evolve Buneary in Pokémon Diamond or Pearl

steps.title: Catch a Buneary in Eterna Forest, west of Eterna City.
steps.content: Catch a Buneary in Eterna Forest, west of Eterna City.

steps.title: Once you have one, make it friendlier.
steps.content: Once you have one, make it friendlier. Check the tips section below for ways of doing this.

steps.title: Check your Pokétch.
steps.content: Check your Pokétch. There is a Friendship Counter App available by talking to a brown-haired girl in the Eterna City Pokémon Center. The more love hearts that pop up when you touch your Pokémon's image, the more it likes you.

steps.title: You may also go for a stroll in Amity Square with your Buneary (located in Hearthome city), it will sometimes boost its happiness!
steps.content: You may also go for a stroll in Amity Square with your Buneary (located in Hearthome city), it will sometimes boost its happiness!

steps.title: Check with the many people who assess your Pokémon's friendliness.
steps.content: Check with the many people who assess your Pokémon's friendliness. The best one to go to is in the Pokémon Fan Club in Hearthome city. Have your Buneary at the front of your party when you talk to her. You can also talk to Dr. Footstep. If your Buneary is deserving of a Footprint Ribbon, it's ready to level up.

steps.title: When your Buneary is at full Happiness, it will evolve the next time you level it up.
steps.content: When your Buneary is at full Happiness, it will evolve the next time you level it up. While training it up, be careful not to let it faint! If you aren't confident about it being strong enough to battle, use a Rare Candy.

steps.title: Once you've leveled it up you'll have the powerful Normal Type, Lopunny.
steps.content: Once you've leveled it up you'll have the powerful Normal Type, Lopunny.
